Booking

1. Carefully fill out the form and click
2. Check your email to confirm the transfer (valid 24 hours)

Reservation information

- No surcharges for early or late trip.
- Free child seats specified in the online booking form.
- In the case of a flight delay we are waiting for you at the airport for free

Book with us

Our standards: experienced, dependable drivers, clean cars, safe driving.
This is a private transfers, no waiting for other passengers.
Your transfer directly to your hotel.
Your driver will stop for rest at your request.

The phone number for urgent communication with the carrier will be sent to Your e-mail together with the confirmation of the terms of the transfer.

For private transfers (return) from Sofia or Bansko:

Executive or MPV car (1–3 persones) – 120 € (Return transfer)
Mini bus (4–7 persones) – 200 € (Return transfer)

• Prices for individual return transfer to Bansko.
• Transportation right to your hotel in Bansko, Razlog or Dobrinishte.
• No extra charge for early or late check-out.
• In the absence of other arrangements the driver picks you up from Bansko for 5 hours prior to departure.
• Free seats for children specify on the special form for online booking.
• Transfer takes around 2 hours and 40 minutes
• The driver takes BGN - leva EUR (1€ = 1.95 lv).
• Currency conversions according to the official, applicable on the territory of Bulgaria
• Coins are not accepted

Note:
Bansko Transfer acts only as an agent. Your contract with the company providing the transfers. All details sent via e-mail.

Select Different Route on the Order page, please.

Fill in the required fields and send a message.

We will contact you.

All vehicles are owned by a transfer service. All contacts with the company, and all correspondence, including conditions of carriage and payment is made directly with transfer company.

“Transfer Bansko" is a partner and makes no warranties and is not responsible for the actions of the shipping company. We do not accept claims under the terms of the service during transportation.
